mapper.select: select custName,projectName,conStrength,castMode,consPos,plancube ,sum(producecubes) as produceCubes ,max(producedate) as lastTime from shippingdocument where custName = #{userName} group by custName,projectName,conStrength,castMode,consPos,plancube order by projectName
mapper.update: UPDATE shippingdocument set signInCube =#{signInCube}, exceptionInfo = #{exceptionInfo}, isSigned =#{isSigned}, modifier=#{modifier},modifytime=getDate() where shipDocID =#{id}
